alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 06 at 8:10PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Jefferson and Walker. * WHEN...Until 1115 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 810 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sumiton, Cordova, Dora, Adamsville, Graysville, West Jefferson, Burnwell, Quinton, Beloit, Rocky Hollow, Gorgas Steam Plant and Barney.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
